status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Appcelerator CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Tooling and the CLI here

fields.description:
I'm creating this ticket just to give you an idea that other tools are using to create a sort of pattern on how to get the users environment.
Some other tools I have used are generating a file called "environment.txt" in the "build" folder, so when some user needs to open a new ticket he just have to upload this file and you have 100% sure what's the user environment.

This is just an idea :)
fields.summary: Create an environment file on the build time

comments.body: Hello, You can easily get those info, by running "appc info" in terminal. Thanks.
